did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.unittitle:
Papers of Elsie Fowke Jackson
1652-1980
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 500 items.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions

See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Elsie Fowke Jackson, Accession #6589-l, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This accession was given to the Library by Elsie Fowke Jackson of Alexandria, Virginia, on October 12, 1982.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This accession consists of ca. 500 items, 1652-1980, primarily concerning the Fowke and Reed families. The types of material include correspondence, legal documents, genealogical notes and charts, photographs, newspaper clippings, a diary, business papers, and memorabilia. Some of the items are electrostatic copies of the originals. Many of the items pertain to the life and activities of Elsie Fowke Jackson, including her extensive genealogical notes regarding the following families: Chandler, Daniel, Dorsey, Fowke, Harrison, Jenkins, Mason, Reed, Rolph, and Washington. Also included are four seventeenth century legal documents including a land grant, 1665 from William Berkeley, governor of Virginia, to Gerard Fowke.

did.unittitle: Elsie Jackson's autograph and typed transcriptions of letter from John Reed to Joseph [Reed], w/additional notes [1861 May 2]
Miscellaneous: military discharge of William J. Fowke; [Y] W. Fallin to C. R. Railey; Lawrence Richey, Secretary to U. S. President, to O. A. C. Oehmler 1864, 1970, 1932
Reed Family correspondence 1869-1929
Fowkes corespondence 1888-1929, n.d.
Letters to Elsie Fowkes Jackson w/other material re E. F. Jackson 1936-1980, n.d.
Land grant of Richard Benonelt to George Foster 1 Sept 1652
Land grant of Garrard [sic] Fowke to Richard Hope 1664 July 7
Grant of land to Gerrard Fowke by Sir William Berkeley 1665 Oct 17
Deed of land sale of James Ashton to Charles Ansell 1679 June 11

Marriage agreement between Samuel Fowke and Ellen Jenkins (copy) 1844 Jan 23
Deed of land sale of John and Harriet Jenkins to John Reed 1850 Aug 31
Receipts and business papers of Capt. R. T. Fowke and others 1860, 1869-1913
Miscellaneous Reed legal and military papers, w/R. B. Reed's survey and map (electronic copy) [1860], 1865, 1867, [1907]
Checks, receipts, and business papers of Robert B. Reed 1874-1916
Deeds of Robert B. Reed 1881-1893, 1916
Miscellaneous fragments n.d.
Chandler: genealogical information n.d.
Daniel, Dorsey, Mason, and Rolph Families: genealogical information 1950, 1974, n.d.
Fowke: Elsie Jackson's typed manuscripts, genealogical charts, extensive notes, and photocopied material n.d.

Reed: genealogical notes and information n.d.

"In Memoriam," poem by J. W. Reed re death of his wife; autograph verse of "Miss Sutton" [to J. B. Bryant?]; autograph verse of unknown authors 1873, 1881, n.d.
Printed material 1880-1970, n.d.
Photographs re Fowke family 1890, 1912, n.d.
Newspaper clippings 1905-1978, n.d.
